metadata.title: CVE-2017-9051 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
libav before 12.1 is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 1 due to NULLpointer dereferencing in the nsv_read_chunk function inlibavformat/nsvdec.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavcodec-extra - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavcodec-extra60 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavcodec60 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavdevice60 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavfilter-extra - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavfilter-extra9 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavfilter9 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavformat-extra - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavformat-extra60 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavformat60 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavutil58 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libpostproc57 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libswresample4 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libswscale7 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:3.2.4-1build4').
